name: Rainward Bound
description:
Oh noe! Rain!

Time to go home before you catch a cold.

But can you get you and your excitable doggo home in time?

~~ Controls ~~

Use the left and right directional buttons to walk.

~~ Tips ~~

  • The blue bar at the top shows how wet you are, when it fills up, you'll catch a cold
  • Watch the clouds to see when it's going to start and stop raining
  • Look at the mini-map on the bottom to see how far the next tree is
  • You'll start to dry when you're sheltered under a tree
  • Beware: the more you pull your dog, the more he'll pull back
  • You can go even faster if your dog is pulling you along
